summary: Adds several new rings that permanently summon powerful creatures.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=18]Summoning Rings[/size]

This mod currently adds 12 rings that summon a variety of different creatures permanently. All rings are forgeable. So far I have added:

-Ring of Arniel\'s Shade 

-Ring of Dragon Priest 

-Ring of Dremora Lord 

-Ring of Flame Thrall 

-Ring of Frost Thrall 

-Ring of Storm Thrall 

-Ring of Familiar 

-Ring of Spider

-Ring of Spriggan

-Ring of Dwarven Spider

-Ring of Dwarven Sphere

-Ring of Dwarven Centurion

Suggestions for more creatures are welcome. To get the rings you create them in the Jewelry section of the forge. To forge each one you need a filled grand soul gem and a gold ring. If your summon gets killed then simply re-equip the ring to summon it again. Ignore the in-game descriptions of the rings - they\'re wrong

[b][u]Installing:[/b][/u]
-Download and move to your Data folder (Probably Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data)
-Upon launching the game check that \'Summoning Rings.esp\' is checked in the Data Files menu

[b][u]Uninstalling:[/b][/u]
-Make sure you do not currently have the rings equipped
-Uncheck \'Summoning Rings.esp\' in your Data Files menu
-Delete the file

[b][u]Current issues:[/b][/u]
-Transparency issues with some of the summons. (Appears to be an issue with the game itself. If you experience this simply re-equip the ring and it should be fixed).
-The descriptions for some of the rings are still slightly messed up.
-The summons added in 1.2 don\'t always fast travel with you and instead try to run to your location. To fix this re-equip the ring.
-The rings in 1.2 are worth 50 more than the ones in 1 & 1.1 As I don\'t know why this is or think it\'s a large issue it\'s unlikely I\'ll fix it soon.

[b][u]Update 1.1[/b][/u]
Issues fixed (Thanks to Tytanis and mecatech for their help with this)
-[s]Disappearing ring upon reload[/s] (Fixed)
-[s]The rings are ludicrously over-valued[/s] (Fixed)
-The descriptions for the rings are a bit messed up (Slightly better now)
[b][u]Update 1.2[/b][/u]
Adds 5 new rings to the mod. 

[b][u]To do[/b][/u]
-Fix all descriptions (Probably in 1.3)
-Fix fast travel issue (Unknown)
-Add more summons (All the time)[/center]
author: StonedNarwhal
